To this day, this is the best 2k I have ever played. The gameplay is literally balanced to perfection, the badge system was amazing, VC grind was also not hard, literally had like 6 builds. Shame that they had to shut down the servers. I miss this games online, but playing the offline modes bring me some nostalgia.
favorite game. I play this religiously. Better than battlefield 6.

negative.review: You pay full price, a new game comes out and you cant even play the game you paid for? Thieves. Ill never give them another dollar.
trash, aint no way they shut down half of the game's modes to force you to buy the new title, 2k a deadass evil company
this fuckass game won't let me play it bc the developers are too god damn lazy to do their fucking job
CLose server suck
CRASHING BEFORE UNTIL NOW
cash grab company
ps4 port lmaoo
laggy
cant even play the game anymore they shut the servers down no mycareer disgusting will never buy another nba game

Oh, I can't play the game anymore.  Like, anything worth doing is just unavailable.  I wish I could get a refund, but the greedy pigs in charge of EA would never agree to being useful at all to any customer.  Not worth supporting, worse than abandonware indie games.

Why would I recommend a game that I can't save offline since the servers were disconnected in 2024. This is the best version of 2K ever so off course they had to sabotage it. Now I can't play this game, in it's entirety, unless I leave my laptop on the entire time?!?! I refuse to believe the 2K DEV team is this retarded. A move such as this had to come from the higher ups. Well, congratulations because I will never buy another 2K product. Which is a shame because I've been faithful with my promise of never playing Madden ever again, after NFL 2K5 smashed EA in price and game play experience. Even had a 1st Person Helmet cam mode. But this, inability to save progress offline... You are all put on notice! When people refuse to purchase your "Own Nothing and Be Happy" Video Games, maybe only then you will realize that you will not be remembered, but what you have done, will not be forgotten.
I don't understand why do they have to make this game unplayable afert 2-3 years. I payed for it. If you don't want me to play with it anymore give my money back!

Seriously, they have to provide an offline MyCareer after shutting down the servers. What's the point now? All I can do is grind out boring quick games, and that doesn't give me the same rush anymore. It's ridiculous that every year a new NBA 2K drops, and the old one just dies after a couple of years. It feels like such a waste of money—I should've just cracked the game instead of buying it.
You pay full price, a new game comes out and you cant even play the game you paid for? Thieves. Ill never give them another dollar.

Boycott NBA titles! Turns out all the old nba games I have and paid for are now unplayable due to them forcing online servers for career mode and then shutting them down when the latest one releases forcing you to buy the latest one.

Scummy stuff. No idea why this is allowed.
trash, aint no way they shut down half of the game's modes to force you to buy the new title, 2k a deadass evil company

Typical 2K . Make a new version and break the old one. I have had enough. I am near 70 years old and have been gaming since it was a thing. Started out with an Adam , through Commodore , IBM and all the rest. What gaming has become is pathetic . Companies rip you off every chance they get. they lie and they steal and they misrepresent their products. But most importantly they make them obsolete at their discretion. When I buy a game I expect be able to play it until I don't want to play it anymore. I have already been through this with Microsoft and all the games I have bought over the years. Games (MICROSOFT GAMES) That supposedly are  not compatable  with windows is the biggest lie ever told. These games work fine once a cd cheat comes into play. Why do I have to use  cheat  when I bought the game in the right way? Its obvious that windows is designed not to recognize these games, which should be criminal act because it was done to prevent me from using something that I already OWN!!! Buying games where I do not hold anything physical in my hand is something I will not do anymore. I have spent enough money on steam for games that don't work anymore!! It will happen no more. I have a 2004 Dell that I keep to use all my disc games from years gone by so I'll just keep playing it. It has not been connected to the net in years and never will be again so these lowlifes can't mess it up too. By the way, I was messing with Dell one day and out the blue a screen came up and said their had been a catastrophic failure and the system was corrupt and unusable. Also had a date on it , 20 years to the day that computer was built. I 
 quickly pulled the plug, then restarted without the internet connection and have been using ever since off line to play the good ole games , you know. the kind they used give you that they can't take away. Oh , thats right , you probably don't know cause they don't want you to. So Anyway I am done. Give me about a Million likes and we'll start a movement to stop this  ****!!!!!
this fuckass game won't let me play it bc the developers are too god damn lazy to do their fucking job

Won't consider buying any 2k games for now, was excited to play this game only to find that a huge percentage of the game is unavailable because of the server shut down. Maybe I'm just living under a rock but 2k14 did not let me down like 2k23 did.
J making sure this continues to be mostly negative. Don't listen to Dr Angelo Dick House, ever since he left House MD he has lost it.

Well I'm not sure when they did it; However, the servers are now turned off and any aspect of the game that was tied to Online is now no more cant play MyCareer anymore as well as many other modes.  How cringe.
servers are turned off and nothings works. Scam.
they killed the servers of this game, dog shit ass fucking company

got a lot of hours out of a simple game, was fun. but out of principle of not being able to play online with friends and the companies laziness, dont play this series. especially cuz they delisted 20 and i cant add it back to my steam account even though i bought it and put thousand hours in. not for the consumer, youll just end up upset.
Can't be played anymore since the server shut down, money wasted :)
Cash grab closed servers no more need to say.
they should let mycareer offline. this is stupid
if you are playing anything other than offline there is no saving your pitiful life
why does it always get worse and worse?
CLose server suck
CRASHING BEFORE UNTIL NOW
cash grab company
waste of money

(1) Sell game.
(2) Shut down 90% of game.
No offline mode.
